reviews.review: Fun to play with friends, not so fun to play alone. The community is an elitist version of the Call of Duty community, so expect small children and incels to scream slurs at you if you're using matchmaking.
Jogo que só tem xiter e os desenvolvedores não fazem nada para impedir pois eles mesmos desenvolvem os xiters e ganham dinheiro com isso.

This game fucking sucks ass. Competitive cooldown my ass. Not my fault my laptop randomly decides to fucking restart the first time and the second I get kicked from the game because of non-verified VAC files. Fuck Off.
